packageName: 9D8N – Ha Noi – Da Nang – Phu Quoc
summaryItinerary: Day 1: Ha Noi Arrival – Join Group Ha Noi Afternoon City Tour (No meal)
Day 2: Ha Noi – Ha Long Bay Overnight Cruise (Breakfast + Lunch + Dinner)
Day 3: Ha Long → Ha Noi → Da Nang – Free Leisure (Breakfast + Brunch)
Day 4: Da Nang – Group Afternoon Tour Marble Mountain & Hoi An (Breakfast)
Day 5: Da Nang – Group Day Tour to Ba Na Hills with Golden Bridge (Breakfast)
Day 6: Da Nang → Phu Quoc – Private Grand World Tour (Breakfast)
Day 7: Phu Quoc – Private Vinpearl Safari & VinWonders Tour (Breakfast)
Day 8: Phu Quoc – Group 3 Islands Tour – Hon Thom Cable Car (Breakfast)

detailedItinerary.title: Ha Noi Arrival – Join Group Afternoon City Tour (No meal)
details: Arrive in Ha Noi and transfer to the hotel for baggage storage.
13:30 – Visit Tran Quoc Pagoda on Golden Fish Island in West Lake.
14:30 – Explore the Temple of Literature, Vietnam’s first university, founded in 1070.
15:30 – Tour Hoa Lo Prison (Maison Centrale) to learn about Vietnam’s colonial-era history.
16:30 – Return to the hotel for check-in and enjoy the rest of the day at leisure in Ha Noi.

detailedItinerary.title: Ha Noi – Ha Long Bay Overnight Cruise (Breakfast + Lunch + Dinner)
details: Breakfast and hotel check-out.
08:00 – Depart for Ha Long Bay via shuttle bus.
11:30 – 12:00 – Arrival at Tuan Chau harbor for cruise check-in.
12:00 – 12:30 – Board Verdure Lotus Cruise, enjoy welcome drinks, safety briefing, and cabin check-in.
13:00 – Vietnamese lunch while cruising through Ha Long – Lan Ha Bay.
15:00 – 15:30 – Relax on the sundeck or kayak around Ba Trai Dao – Tra Bau area.
17:30 – 18:30 – Join Happy Hour and Vietnamese cooking class.
19:00 – Dinner onboard followed by optional squid fishing or relaxation on deck.

detailedItinerary.title: Ha Long → Ha Noi → Da Nang – Evening Arrival – Free Leisure (Breakfast + Brunch)
details: 06:15 – Sunrise Tai Chi and light breakfast.
07:00 – Visit Dark & Light Cave by kayak or bamboo boat.
09:30 – Return to cabin and prepare for check-out.
10:00 – Final cruise through the bay with brunch served in the restaurant.
11:00 – Tender back to Tuan Chau port and shuttle to Ha Noi.
Transfer to Noi Bai Airport for your flight to Da Nang.
Upon arrival in Da Nang, private transfer to the hotel and evening at leisure.

detailedItinerary.title: Da Nang – Marble Mountain & Hoi An Ancient Town (Breakfast)
details: Breakfast and morning at leisure.
15:15 – 15:45 – Join group tour to Marble Mountain (Ngu Hanh Son), exploring pagodas, caves, and stone-carving village.
18:00 – Depart for Hoi An Ancient Town.
Experience Japanese Bridge, lantern-lit streets, and riverside ambiance.
21:00 – Return to the hotel and overnight in Da Nang.

detailedItinerary.title: Ba Na Hills & Golden Bridge (Breakfast)
details: 07:30 – 08:30 – Transfer to Ba Na Hills via scenic coastal route.
Ride the world-renowned cable car systems to the summit.
Visit Golden Bridge, French Village, Linh Ung Pagoda, and Fantasy Park.
Afternoon descent by cable car and return to Da Nang by 17:30.
Evening at leisure.

detailedItinerary.title: Da Nang → Phu Quoc – Private Grand World Tour (Breakfast)
details: Breakfast and hotel check-out before noon.
Private transfer to Da Nang Airport for flight to Phu Quoc.
Arrival and baggage drop at the hotel; check-in at 15:00.
15:30 – Private car transfer to Grand World 'Sleepless City' complex.
Enjoy cultural shows, shopping streets, and waterfront attractions.
20:00 – Return to hotel; overnight in Phu Quoc.

detailedItinerary.title: Vinpearl Safari & VinWonders (Breakfast)
details: 08:30 – Private transfer to Vinpearl Safari, Vietnam’s first open zoo.
Continue to VinWonders for world-class rides, slides, and themed zones.
19:00 – Return to hotel; overnight in Phu Quoc.

detailedItinerary.title: 3 Islands Tour & Hon Thom Cable Car (Breakfast)
details: 08:00 – 08:30 – Join group transfer to Pearl Farm.
Speedboat cruise through Mong Tay/May Rut and Gam Ghi/Roi Islands for snorkeling and relaxation.
Optional Sea Walking at Coral Park (extra cost).
12:00 – 12:30 – Arrive at Hon Thom Island, enjoy Aquatopia Water Park, and ride the 25-minute cable car.
16:30 – Visit Sunset Town Mediterranean architecture.
17:30 – Return to hotel; overnight in Phu Quoc.

detailedItinerary.title: Phu Quoc Departure (Breakfast)
details: Breakfast and hotel check-out by 12:00.
Private transfer to Phu Quoc Airport for departure.
Tour ends — thank you for booking with us!

Roundtrip Ha Noi ↔ Ha Long shuttle bus transfers (no guide).
Meals per itinerary: 8 Breakfasts, 1 Lunch, 1 Dinner, 1 Brunch.
07 hotel nights + 01 night on Verdure Lotus Cruise (double/twin sharing).
Entrance fees, Ba Na Hills cable car, Grand World gondola, Vinpearl Safari & VinWonders, Hon Thom cable car.
01 bottle of 500ml water per person per touring day.
Private car without guide for Day 6 and Day 7 tours.
excludes: Ba Na Hills attractions not listed (Wine Cellar Debay, Wax Museum, Alpine Coaster, coin-operated games).
Hoi An lantern boat, Marble Mountain elevator.
Beverages on cruise or during meals; corkage surcharges.
Electric cars inside Vinpearl complexes and Grand World add-ons (Teddy Bear Museum, Quintessence Show).
Sea walking / scuba diving during island tour.
Unlisted meals, personal expenses, laundry, phone calls.
Optional tour tips and compulsory travel insurance.
Early check-in/late check-out, peak-season surcharges, costs from force majeure delays.
